channel.title: U.S. Police Shooting News Tracker
channel.description: Automated news aggregation tracking police-involved shootings in the United States

item.title: Dramatic video shows moment NYPD shoots knife-wielding man — but Mamdani wants to send social workers
item.description: Heart-pounding bodycam footage shows the moment an NYPD officer shot and wounded a mentally ill 22-year-old man who lunged at the cop with a knife inside a Queens home last week. The Jan. 26 police shooting of schizophrenic man Jabez Chakraborty has prompted …

item.title: Heart-pounding bodycam footage shows moment NYPD cop shoots knife-wielding man with ‘history of mental issues’
item.description: The Jan. 26 police shooting of schizophrenic man Jabez Chakraborty has prompted backlash from the family, and fueled a renewed push from Mayor Zohran Mamdani for his proposed Department of Community Safety to deal with mental health crises.

item.title: Inquest into fatal police shooting hears officer shot teen because he believed officers were in danger
item.description: A Winnipeg police officer who fatally shot a 16-year-old First Nations girl following a robbery and car chase says there was nothing that could have trained him for that moment.

item.title: Brothers of Renee Good, woman fatally shot by ICE, tell public forum 'what a beautiful American we have lost'
item.description: Luke and Brent Ganger, Renee Good's brothers, spoke lovingly of their sister during a public forum hosted by U.S. Congressional Democrats to discuss the use of force by federal agents carrying out the Trump administration’s immigration crackdown. Good, a 37-y…

item.title: Mamdani calls on DA to not prosecute mentally ill man shot by police during knife attack
item.description: New York City Mayor Zohran Mamdani said he opposes prosecuting the mentally ill man shot by police after charging them with a knife in Queens.

item.title: NYPD releases video showing police shooting 22-year-old schizophrenic man
item.description:
A family member tries to intervene as Jabez Chakraborty approaches officers in his Queens home.
Footage shows Jabez Chakraborty picking up a knife immediately on seeing officers and moving toward them before one opens fire inside the family’s Queens home. …

item.title: WATCH: Brothers of Renee Good, woman fatally shot by ICE, remember their sister with lawmakers
item.description: Luke Ganger and Brent Ganger spoke about the distress the family has felt since an Immigration and Customs Enforcement agent fatally shot the 37-year-old mother and U.S. citizen.

item.title: 'Smear campaign' exposed as DHS attacks on shot immigrants immediately unravel in court
item.description: After a US Border Patrol Agent shot two Venezuelan immigrants in Portland, Oregon, in January, the Department of Homeland Security claimed that the two victims were “vicious Tren de Aragua gang members” who “weaponized their vehicle” against federal agents,…

item.title: Celebration of life set for Gwinnett officer killed in line of duty
item.description: Celebration of life set for Gwinnett officer killed in line of dutywsbtv.com

item.title: 'Smear Campaign' Detected as DHS Claims About Pair Shot by Border Patrol Unravel in Court
item.description: After a US Border Patrol Agent shot two Venezuelan immigrants in Portland, Oregon in January, the Department of Homeland Security claimed that the two victims were "vicious Tren de Aragua gang members" who "weaponized their vehicle" against federal agents, wh…

item.title: Inside Minneapolis’s ICE Watch Network - One of the city’s protest organizations stoked a raging fire.
item.description: n less than a month, two “ICE watchers” have been shot and killed by immigration enforcement agents in Minneapolis. On January 24, a federal agent shot and killed 37-year-old Alex Pretti, a Veterans Affairs ICU nurse. His death follows that of Renée Good, a 3…

item.title: Alex Pretti’s death ruled homicide after Minneapolis shooting by federal agents
item.description: The death of Alex Pretti, the Minneapolis man killed by federal agents, has been ruled a homicide, the Hennepin County medical examiner’s office said. Pretti was shot Jan. 24 during a chaotic encounter with federal immigration officers in Minneapolis. Citing …

item.title: Arizona man accused of human smuggling is a repeat offender who once 'threw rocks' at Army helicopter: docs
item.description: Suspected human smuggler shot by federal agents near Arizona border is repeat offender, officials say. Patrick Schlegel allegedly fired at agents.

item.title: Shooting in Georgia hotel room leaves 1 officer killed, another seriously wounded: 'Unprovoked attack'
item.description: A Georgia police officer was killed and another was wounded after a suspect allegedly opened fire in a hotel room as he was being questioned.

item.title: Police officer killed, another critically wounded in shooting at Georgia hotel - ABC News
item.description: Police officer killed, another critically wounded in shooting at Georgia hotelABC News Gwinnett County officer dead, another officer injured in ‘unprovoked attack’ at hotelWSB-TV Gwinnett Police: Suspect who killed one officer, injured another had long crimin…

item.title: Police officer killed, another critically wounded in shooting at Georgia hotel
item.description: Gunfire broke out after two officers were dispatched on a call reporting fraud.

item.title: 11 days before he was shot and killed by ICE, Alex Pretti kicked out a vehicle taillight and got wrestled to the ground
item.description: At no point in the newly uncovered videos does Pretti reach for his gun and it is unclear whether the federal agents saw it.

item.title: MORNING GLORY: Minnesota tragedies aren't instant replay calls you make from the couch
item.description: America's criminal justice system requires patience and complete evidence, not instant replay mentality, argues Fox News contributor Hugh Hewitt following Minnesota police shootings.

item.title: There’s A Reason Many Police Dept’s Ban Shooting At Moving Vehicles: It Saves Lives Without Putting Officers In Greater Danger
item.description: Minneapolis is once again the focus of debates about violence involving law enforcement after an Immigration and Customs Enforcement officer shot and killed Renee Nicole Good, a 37-year-old mother, in her car. The incident quickly prompted dueling narratives.…

item.title: Knife-wielding nut allegedly asked Christian his religion – then stabbed him and dog before police shot him
item.description: Armed Washington suspect died after police shooting following alleged stabbing attack on man and dog that occurred after asking victim about Christian faith in Parkland on Sunday.

item.title: A second U.S. citizen was killed by federal forces in Minneapolis. Here's what we know
item.description: The fatal shooting of Alex Pretti, the second U.S. citizen to be killed by federal forces in Minnesota this month, has intensified the public outrage over tactics used by immigration agents in the state and united unlikely bedfellows in calling for a full inv…
